Source code documentation¶

Modules¶

Module ptree¶

This module provides class PathScan Compatibility: python 3.5 (required by os.DirEntry)

class ptree.PathScan(path, question=True)¶

Abstraction for providing the data structure stemming from the scan of a path.

getRelPath(dirId)¶

Get the path (relative to the main scanned path) of the directory whith ID number ‘dirId’.

matchHash(hashNum)¶

Get files matching the MD5 hash number ‘hashNum’.

static md5sum(filePath)¶

Compute the md5 sum of a file

Parameters:filePath – path to the file
Returns:str

Module compare¶

Compatibility: python 3.X

class compare.Misnaming(path, refName, compName)¶
shell()¶
class compare.Misplacement(refPath, refName, compFounds)¶
class compare.Missing(refPath, refName)¶

Descriptive elements for files of the reference directory that are missing in the compared one

class compare.New(compPath, compName)¶

Descriptive elements for files of the compared directory that are missing in the reference one

class compare.Handler(refPathScan, compPathScan)¶
describe(filepath='./whamdil.log')¶

Create a log file providing a description of differences between the content of directories

shell(filepath='./whamdil.sh')¶

Create a Bourne shell script file providing commands intending to even the directories
